title: Data Interpretation and Advanced Mean Value Concept Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A language-integrated course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, targeting enhanced data-driven decision-making capabilities.

learning_goals: Learners explain the process of calculating averages by linking it with visual aids using real-world workplace data.
Learners analyze statistical error cases that may occur when deriving averages and document findings in a report.
Through team-based projects, learners conduct case studies on how the concept of averages is applied in real workplace contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
